data.actual_result: Up and down arrow do not do anything.
data.expected_result: Up and down arrows should move to next / previous user in selection area.
data.short_description: Right clicking on selection area in DM invite box disables up down arrows navigation.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the invite DM box. - Press on anyone just to make sure up and down arrows work. - Press up / down arrows a few times to reconfirm. - Right click on the selection area. - Notice the input cursor disappears.
